categories.name: Process & Efficiency Optimization
categories.description: Recognition focused on improving internal workflows, reducing manual effort, or enhancing system performance through automation or redesign.

subcategories.name: Automation & Time Savings
subcategories.description: Implementing solutions that drastically reduce manual workload or testing time.

subcategories.name: System Reliability & Performance
subcategories.description: Direct improvements to the stability, speed, or uptime of core products or infrastructure.
examples: optimized the mobile app reducing load time by 60%

categories.name: Business Growth & Market Impact
categories.description: Recognition tied directly to measurable financial outcomes, market expansion, or significant revenue generation.

subcategories.name: Revenue Generation & Expansion
subcategories.description: Achieving significant financial results or successfully entering new revenue streams.

subcategories.name: Audience Engagement & Reach
subcategories.description: Increasing user interaction, traffic, or adoption metrics.

categories.name: Product Strategy & Insight
categories.description: Recognition for high-level planning, strategic direction setting, and delivering data-driven insights that shape the product or business direction.

subcategories.name: Strategic Planning & Roadmapping
subcategories.description: Leading the definition of future direction for products or business units.

subcategories.name: Data-Driven Decision Making
subcategories.description: Providing critical analysis that directly influences business choices and performance metrics.
examples: consistently delivers insights that drive business decisions
led analysis and strategy for entering 3 new markets

categories.name: Team & People Development
categories.description: Awards focused on building, mentoring, and fostering the growth and success of team members.

subcategories.name: Mentorship & Skill Transfer
subcategories.description: Directly coaching individuals to improve skills or achieve career milestones.

subcategories.name: Team Building & Retention
subcategories.description: Creating an environment that attracts and retains top talent.

categories.name: Quality & Execution Excellence
categories.description: Recognition for maintaining high standards in daily work, ensuring quality output, and delivering exceptional results under pressure.

subcategories.name: Quality Assurance & Standards
subcategories.description: Focus on the meticulousness and quality inherent in the work product itself.

subcategories.name: Rapid Onboarding & Delivery
subcategories.description: Achieving high performance quickly or delivering complex features ahead of expectations.
examples: delivering exceptional results in first 90 days

categories.name: Customer & Stakeholder Service
categories.description: Recognition for outstanding performance in direct interaction with customers or cross-functional partners, often measured by satisfaction scores.

subcategories.name: Customer Satisfaction & Support
subcategories.description: Exceeding expectations in resolving issues and maintaining high user happiness.
examples: proactive support and going above and beyond

subcategories.name: Cross-Functional Collaboration
subcategories.description: Successfully integrating efforts across different departments to achieve a unified goal.
examples: worked seamlessly with sales and product

final_taxonomy.reasoning: The taxonomy moves from high-level impact (Business Growth, Strategy) down to execution quality (Process Optimization, Quality Excellence) and interpersonal contributions (Team Development, Service). This structure avoids generic terms by focusing on the *type of contribution* evident in the messages, such as measurable efficiency gains (C1) versus strategic planning (C3).

result.summary: No new categories met the frequency threshold. Phase 1 taxonomy used as-is.
